.. _mcu:
MCUs -  All About Our Code
==========================
This section of the documentation will go over everything code related. An explanation of all the communication protocols, as well as the API references for our custom libraries. Again, you may find the associated code at our `GitHub <https://github.com/YuanYoshimi/RCJ-Soccer-Robot>`_ in the appropriate namespaces.

.. toctree::
   Teensy
   OpenMV
